Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.players.bridges

Class Bridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.players.bridges.Bridge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Deaths
    public class Bridge
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Main class for storing all the damages , marks , kills and possible actions of the linked player.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Bridge​(Color color)
      creates a player's bridge with the players linked color

                       boolean checkMarks)
        appends another shot to the damage bridge of the player
        Parameters:
        color - the color of the player who did the damage
        checkMarks - checks if the new shot should transform all the marks of the same player into damages

                  throws IllegalActionException

        Parameters:
        id - id of the action the player wants to choose
        Throws:
